title: Improve Your Book BSR
description:
In this video, Improve Your Book BSR
This video discusses ways to improve your BSR (Best Seller Rank) and increase your book income stream. The three tips are:
Find low competition niches. This means finding topics that are popular but not too saturated with other books. You can do this by using keyword research tools or by browsing Amazon's bestseller lists.
Get enough sales in an hour. This means selling at least one book per hour. You can do this by running promotions, advertising, or simply getting the word out about your book.
Promote and lean into the momentum of yesterday's success. This means continuing to promote your book after it has been released. You can do this by writing blog posts, guest posting, or running social media ads.
By following these tips, you can improve your BSR and increase your book income stream.
In addition to these tips, here are a few more things you can do to improve your BSR:
Write a high-quality book that people will want to read.
